statements: DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE arrival_date < '2021-01-01' AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE trend_name = 'Temperature Change';
DELETE FROM CrossDockEfficiencyAnalysis WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND arrival_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_name = 'Daily Sales';
DELETE FROM historical_orders WHERE customer_id = 500 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_name = 'High Demand' AND trend_description LIKE '%increasing%';
